verses.plain: In Judah is God known: his name is great in Israel.

tokens.t: In Judah
God known: his name
great in Israel.

verses.plain: In Salem also is his tabernacle, and his dwelling place in Zion.

tokens.t: In Salem also is his tabernacle, and his dwelling place in Zion.

verses.plain: There brake he the arrows of the bow, the shield, and the sword, and the battle. Selah.

tokens.t: There brake he the arrows of the bow, the shield, and the sword, and the battle. Selah.

verses.plain: Thou art more glorious and excellent than the mountains of prey.

tokens.t: Thou
more glorious
excellent than the mountains of prey.

verses.plain: The stouthearted are spoiled, they have slept their sleep: and none of the men of might have found their hands.

tokens.t: The stouthearted are spoiled, they have slept their sleep: and none of the men of might have found their hands.

verses.plain: At thy rebuke, O God of Jacob, both the chariot and horse are cast into a dead sleep.

tokens.t: At thy rebuke, O God of Jacob, both the chariot and horse are cast into a dead sleep.

verses.plain: Thou, even thou, art to be feared: and who may stand in thy sight when once thou art angry?

tokens.t: Thou,
thou,
to be feared: and who may stand in thy sight when once thou art angry?

verses.plain: Thou didst cause judgment to be heard from heaven; the earth feared, and was still,

tokens.t: Thou didst cause judgment to be heard from heaven; the earth feared, and was still,

verses.plain: When God arose to judgment, to save all the meek of the earth. Selah.

tokens.t: When God arose to judgment, to save all the meek of the earth. Selah.

verses.plain: Surely the wrath of man shall praise thee: the remainder of wrath shalt thou restrain.

tokens.t: Surely the wrath of man shall praise thee: the remainder of wrath shalt thou restrain.

verses.plain: Vow, and pay unto the LORD your God: let all that be round about him bring presents unto him that ought to be feared.

tokens.t: Vow, and pay unto the
your God: let all that be round about him bring presents unto him that ought to be feared.

verses.plain: He shall cut off the spirit of princes: he is terrible to the kings of the earth.

tokens.t: He shall cut off the spirit of princes:
terrible to the kings of the earth.
